about_the_game:
The Merchant of Death has received a strange shipment of charms! Show your favorite creator love with these brand new weapon charms and give your favorite firearms some extra flair.

The New Charms

  • AlphaBroVR - The Gym Loving Rifter; a double sided charm.
  • ArtificalActr - A Holographic Pyramid, with a special message
  • CrawlerTV - A Bundle of Grave Juice
  • LonelyViper - A Special Sauce Sachet
  • Ragesaq - A red logo surrounded in gold; embrace the dark side
  • ScopeOG - A crosshair logo; showcase your precision and style
  • ShortStack - A short stack of stylized pancakes
  • Tanvarian - An Orange Munchkin Cat, a playful addition to any firearm
  • TheNollic - A man who loves Toilet Paper with a touch of humor
  • TimelessVR - A deep space filled infinity symbol
  • TribeGreywolfVR - A polygon Wolf, a nod to the Tribe
  • Twiejk - Cheese lover gets his cheese knife

The items listed are designed for your firearms. These are entirely new items that are purchasable from the Merchant of Death.

As this is an DLC purchase, it cannot be refunded and content is consumed at purchase.
